core.​ XPS_typ_Exception

TypeDefinition

Authors

Crashdome

Description

HashmapObject which stores data about an error condition.  Typically is thrown using the throw command and possibly handled using try / catch

Parent

none

Implements

XPS_ifc_IException

Flags
Properties
Data
get "Data"

XPS_ifc_IException

Returns
Hashmap

provides more detail about the exception

Message
get "Message"

XPS_ifc_IException

Returns
String

A message about the exception thrown

Source
get "Source"

XPS_ifc_IException

Returns
Anything

typcally the source HashmapObject that caused this error

Target
get "Target"

XPS_ifc_IException

Returns
Anything

typcally the Method or Script Name that caused this error

Methods
#create
createhashmapobject [XPS_typ_Exception, _source*, _target*, _message*, _data*]
Optionals
_source

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_target

(optional - Default: nil) - Anything

_message

(optional - Default: nil) - String - custom message to override the default

_data

(optional - Default: nil) - Hashmap - hashmap of data that provides more detail to cause of exception

GetText
call ["GetText"]
Returns
Text

A Structured Text formatted as follows:

XPS_typ_Exception:
         Source: (source)
         Target: (target)
         Message: (message)
         Data: (data)
